action: Applies ΣδΦΠ to the entire cube to obtain a single Normal Form NF(B).

vertexwise\_application.constraint: Σ acting after any commuting path of δ, Φ, Π yields the same NF(B).

normal\_form\_axiom.statement: For any two paths p1, p2 from B to any vertex v in the cube, Σ∘p1(B) \= Σ∘p2(B).
normal\_form\_axiom.interpretation: Tri-Unity+Σ commutativity: δ/Φ/Π order does not change the Σ-Normal Form.
